title: Stitch Hangry Red Licensed Graphic T-Shirt - 2XL
features: Officially Licensed Disney Lilo & Stitch Product
This red heather tee features a large front graphic print of Stitch with "Hangry" above
Listed in Men's Sizes. Fits women desiring a looser fit.
description: Bring the fun and excitement of Disney to your wardrobe with this classic Lilo & Stitch t-shirt. This red heather tee features a front graphic print of Stitch and the text "Hangry" on the front, perfect for any fan of the beloved movie. Crafted with a soft cotton blend and a classic fit, it's sure to keep you comfortable all day long. Whether you're lounging around the house or headed out with friends, this tee will show your love of Disney in style.
